CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL( Membership_Plan__c , 'Silver')&&ISPICKVAL( Subscription__c , 'Monthly') , 99, IF( ISPICKVAL( Membership_Plan__c , 'Gold')&&ISPICKVAL( Subscription__c , 'Monthly') , 80, IF( ISPICKVAL( Membership_Plan__c , 'Platinum')&&ISPICKVAL( Subscription__c , 'Monthly') , 70, IF( ISPICKVAL( Membership_Plan__c , 'Silver')&&ISPICKVAL( Subscription__c , 'Quarterly') , 250, IF( ISPICKVAL( Membership_Plan__c , 'Gold')&&ISPICKVAL( Subscription__c , 'Quarterly') , 220, IF( ISPICKVAL( Membership_Plan__c , 'Platinum')&&ISPICKVAL( Subscription__c , 'Quarterly') , 200, IF( ISPICKVAL( Membership_Plan__c , 'Silver')&&ISPICKVAL( Subscription__c , 'Annual') , 1000, IF( ISPICKVAL( Membership_Plan__c , 'Gold')&&ISPICKVAL( Subscription__c , 'Annual') , 1200, IF( ISPICKVAL( Membership_Plan__c , 'Platinum')&&ISPICKVAL( Subscription__c , 'Annual') , 1500, 0 )))))))))
CustomField.label: Total Amount
